name: Cookie
overview: Short but sweet. Charlie the chef has to daze escaped ingredients with flour and knock them into the mixing bowl at the bottom of the screen. If they accidentally go into the dustbins, they will be eaten by the a monster that looks exactly like Oscar the Grouch from Sesame Street. If nasties get into the cake mix, then the 'ingredients needed' counter will increase, and Charlie will have to work quicker and faster to bake his cake.
